description: Dalgona Challenges - XSS Challenge Platform running on Flask/Werkzeug with Python 2.7.18 (EOL)
notes: Application intentionally disables XSS protection (X-XSS-Protection: 0). Running on outdated Python 2.7.18 (EOL since January 2020) and older Werkzeug 1.0.1. Challenge platform designed for XSS exploitation training. POST endpoint on /xss25 processes user input and returns error messages that may reveal server-side logic.
